section.title: Administrator Authorization
section.note:
To delete an XDCR replication, an administrator must have one of these roles:
Full administrator
Cluster administrator
Replication administrator
To learn about administrative roles in Couchbase, see .

body.p: To delete the replication, delete the active replications.

ol.li: In the XDCR section of the Couchbase Web Console, click Delete next to the active replication you want to delete.
